channel.title: How and where do i put a client into
channel.description: ive just downloaded one, but i dont know have a clue where to put the file into, i have also got the client for moparscape downloaded if i need it :|[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 30, 2008, 04:10:40 pm[/size][hr]HELP?

item.title: How and where do i put a client into
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

<< If it opens with winrar

Go File - Save archive copy as … - Save

<< After this : right-click mouse - Extract files to “File-name”/

<< Now you got the client in a Word documentmap, Open it and search for Run.bat, Press that and your client will load up.

You could also go <Tutorials / In the Sticky 1’s I’m sure you could find youre answer.
To lazy maybey?

Read full topic
